title: not happy
body: I do not like how I get l kicked to a lowe game 20 min wate just because I can not get back on ill stop plaing and go to blizzare and steam

replies.body: Hey I'd like to help but need more info.  Did you run into any errors?  What happened?  We can't remove a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but I'd like to help you prevent further ones.
